dmca.title: [ABUSE] Legal Notice ("DMCA") from Apple Computer, Inc. / our ref#0684]
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Monday, September 27, 2004 9:54 AM
To: Legal Response
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Legal Notice ("DMCA") from Apple Computer, Inc. / our
ref#0684]

Forwarding to Legal Response for review.


-------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] Legal Notice ("DMCA") from Apple Computer,        Inc. / our 
ref#0684
Date: Fri, 24 Sep 2004 17:59:40 -0700
From: Piracy <piracy@apple.com>
To: <copyright@theplanet.com>
CC: abuse@theplanet.com

***Privileged & Confidential***
--Please do not forward, copy or redistribute--

Via Email

September 24, 2004

Lance Crosby, Esq.
ThePlanet.com Internet Services
1333 Stemmons Freeway
Suite 110
Dallas, TX  75207

Dear Copyright Agent:

     Re:  Apple's Case ID# 0684
